title: Belmont, Massachusetts - Wikipedia
snippet: Belmont remains a primarily residential suburb, with little population growth since the 1950s. It is best known for the mansion-filled Belmont Hill neighborhood, although most residents live in more densely settled, low-lying areas around the Hill.

title: Belmont University | A Private Christian College in Nashville
snippet: Named one of the most innovative colleges nationally for more than 15 years, Belmont is committed to helping learners of all ages lead extraordinary lives of purpose, character and wisdom.

title: City of Belmont | Home
snippet: Join us throughout the year as we honor our history, highlight our community, and celebrate this exciting milestone. Visit www.belmont.gov/100years to find out how you can get involved! Learn more! Looking for our weekly newsletter or the latest news from the City of Belmont? Read it here!

title: Belmont University - Wikipedia
snippet: Belmont is located in an urban setting near Nashville's Midtown district, with the campus sandwiched by the Hillsboro-West End, Music Row, Edgehill, and Belmont-Hillsboro neighborhoods.
